snippet.title: With the Fire and Sword - Official  Trailer
snippet.description:
The long-awaited event has finally happened! We have been working hard for Steam support for a long time, and finally we have succeeded! The game can be added to favorites, and anyone who is looking forward to its release can do so right now via the link!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/3292740/With_The_Fire_And_Sword/?beta=0
